hero.title: Reflect on Your 2025, Step into 2026
hero.subtitle: Take a moment to pause, reflect on your journey, and set your intentions for the year ahead. Your story matters, and this reflection is yours to keep.

form.title: Your 2025 Reflection
form.subtitle: Take your time with each question. There's no rush. Your reflections are personal and meaningful.
form.nameLabel: Would you like to share your name? (Optional)
form.namePlaceholder: Your name or leave blank for anonymous

grateful.question: What are you most grateful for in 2025?
grateful.placeholder: Think about the people, experiences, or moments that brought joy to your year...

challenge.question: What was one challenge that made you stronger?
challenge.placeholder: Every challenge carries a lesson. What did you learn from this experience?

moment.question: What was one moment that brought you peace or happiness?
moment.placeholder: A quiet sunrise, a deep conversation, a simple act of kindness...

leaveBehind.question: What do you want to leave behind in 2025?
leaveBehind.placeholder: Old habits, limiting beliefs, or situations that no longer serve you...

intention.question: What is your biggest intention for 2026?
intention.placeholder: A goal, a dream, a way of being that you want to cultivate...

word.question: What one word defines the 2026 you want to create?
word.placeholder: Growth, Love, Courage, Balance, Adventure, Peace...
